import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Fade } from 'react-slideshow-image'; import Syria from './assets/syriacover.jpg'; import Thai from './assets/thaicavecover.png'; class Portfolio extends Component { render() { const fadeImages = [ Syria, Thai ]; return (

Portfolio

1 of 5

Internship

{/*
*/}

The New York Times

As a Graphics intern on the Immersive team, I was tasked with prototyping 3-D assets to visualize AR moments, researching and testing the use of the Microsoft Hololens in future articles, and creating cover images and diagrams as seen here and here. During the Maker's Week Hackathon, I also helped build the front end for our 3-D Crossword project.

Inspired by old New Yorker cartoons, I started my own cartoon instagram called Peng and Ink as an outlet to showcase my humor and creativity. It follows a potato-shaped, sassier, and much smaller version of me as I navigate the ups and downs of work, dating, and everything in between. If you love cartoons or just want a laugh, feel free to give me a follow!:)

) } } export default Portfolio;
